ygData.subject: root spell
ygData.msgSnippet: I just want to know why, whenever there is a tournament, that the root spell is band.  I wonder if the people that hold these tournaments realize no wizard
ygData.messageBody:
I just want to know why, whenever there is a tournament, that the root spell
is band. I wonder if the people that hold these tournaments realize no
wizard would ever show up to one of these things. Warriors must be getting
pissed off because they always lose!!! And one other thing, my friend is a
level 27 cleric and he said they never go out without a wizard. he said
their group hated lower level wizards but after level 20 they always needed
one. gives me hope because i'm only level 12.

Parthon
